summary: Comprehensive testing of KasaBurger Delivery Platform Settings page completed. All features working correctly: 4 platform tabs (Yemeksepeti, Getir, Trendyol, Migros), form fields, save/load functionality, connection test, and sidebar navigation. Backend 100% pass rate (15/15 tests). Frontend UI fully functional.

issues: Chart components show warning about width/height being -1 - this is a minor rendering issue that doesn't affect functionality

passed_tests: Admin Login - admin@kasaburger.net.tr / admin123 credentials work
Sidebar Navigation - 'Platform Entegrasyonları' link navigates to /delivery-settings
Page Load - DeliveryPlatformSettings page loads correctly
4 Platform Tabs - Yemeksepeti, Getir Yemek, Trendyol Yemek, Migros Yemek tabs visible
Tab Switching - All tabs clickable and switch content correctly
Form Fields - API Key, API Secret, Restaurant ID, Supplier ID, Store ID fields visible per platform
Aktif/Pasif Switch - Toggle switch works for enabling/disabling platforms
Save Platform Config - POST /api/delivery/platforms saves config to MongoDB
Load Platform Config - GET /api/delivery/platforms loads saved configs
Webhook URL Display - Webhook URLs displayed correctly for each platform
Settings Section - Otomatik Kabul switch and Varsayılan Hazırlık Süresi input work
Summary Cards - Bottom cards show platform status (Aktif/Yapılandırılmamış)
Toast Notifications - Success/error toasts display correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper use of data-testid attributes for testing
API secrets are correctly excluded from GET responses (security best practice)
Platform configs are properly persisted in MongoDB delivery_platforms collection
seed_data_creation: Created test platform configs for Yemeksepeti, Getir, Trendyol, Migros during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Delivery Platform Settings page fully functional. Login with admin@kasaburger.net.tr/admin123. Navigate via sidebar 'Platform Entegrasyonları' link or directly to /delivery-settings. All 4 platforms (Yemeksepeti, Getir, Trendyol, Migros) can be configured with API credentials. Connection test works for enabled platforms. Data persisted in MongoDB delivery_platforms collection.
